com.example.spotifyclone

Class TimerClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment
        • androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatDialogFragment
          • com.google.android.material.bottomsheet.BottomSheetDialogFragment
            • com.example.spotifyclone.TimerClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class TimerClass
extends com.google.android.material.bottomsheet.BottomSheetDialogFragment
    TimerClass is Responsible for opening and making the Timer Function to Make the music Stop after a certain amount of time the user chooses.
    Source: https://codinginflow.com/tutorials/android/countdowntimer/part-1-countdown-timer
    Modified By : Ahmed Mahmoud Fawzi
    Version:
    1.0

        public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup container,
                                      android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        The OnCreateView in this Class is responsible for assigning the variables and opening the layout assigned.
        Inside the OnCreateView the onclicklistener for the buttons is called to call its Function.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstance)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.DialogFragment

      • startTimer

        private void startTimer()
        This Function is responsible to do an action after a certain amount of time.
        It creates an object of the CountDownTimer CLass giving it the time assigned with the click of each button.
        It then Does a function when a time reaches and sets the Text and the drawable resource for the Timer button in the MorePageDown.

      • endstartTimer

        private void endstartTimer()
        A function to calculate to stop timer at end of music
